CueAdvanced.OnAnimationPlaying: Check if Cue animation is on
CueAdvanced.OnSoundPlaying: Check if Cue sound is playing
CueState:
Use this file to define custom functions and blocks.
Read more at https://makecode.microbit.org/blocks/custom
cue.DoPose:
Drive to a 'pose' within the given time and then stop.
Be sure to understand the coordinate system.
cue.DoPose|param|degrees: angle to turn after getting to position (x,y)
cue.DoPose|param|time: do the pose in this time (seconds)
cue.IsAnimationPlaying:
Is animation playing on cue?
@return isPlaying : True if animation is playing in cue
cue.IsButtonPressed:
Is a cue button pressed?

@return isPressed
cue.IsCueFacing: Is cue facing a certain direction
cue.IsSoundPlaying:
Is sound playing on cue?
@return isPlaying : True if any sound is playing in cue
cue.LeftTurn: Turn counter-clockwise the specified degrees at specified speed(cm/s) and then stop.
cue.Look: Make cue look in a direction
cue.ReadDistanceToObstacle: Read distance to obstacle from wheel on cue
cue.ReadDistanceToObstacle|param|side: direction from cue marked by wheels
cue.ReadDistanceTravelled: Read distance travelled by individual wheels in cm
cue.ReadDistanceTravelled|param|wheel: Left or right wheel on Cue
cue.ReadHeadPan:
Read head pan of cue in degrees
@return head pan(horizontal) in degrees
cue.ReadHeadTilt:
Read head tilt of cue in degrees
@return head tilt(vertical) in degrees
cue.RightTurn: Turn clockwise the specified degrees at specified speed(cm/s) and then stop.
cue.SetHeadPanAndTilt: Control Cue's pan and tilt (horizontal and vertical direction)
cue.SetHeadPanAndTilt|param|panAngle: horizontal angle in degrees (-180 to 180) e.g, 45
cue.SetHeadPanAndTilt|param|tiltAngle: vertical angle in degrees (-90 to 90) e.g, 45
cue.SetHeadPan|param|angle: horizontal angle in degrees (-90 to 90) e.g, 45
cue.SetHeadTilt|param|angle: vertical angle in degrees (-45 to 45) e.g, 30
cue.SetLEDColor: Set color on LEDs in cue or turn them off
cue.SetLinearAndAngularSpeed: Start moving forward with linear speed while also turning
cue.SetPose: Set cue's 'pose' within the given time. Doesn't block execution.
cue.SetWheelSpeeds: Set robot's speed - keeps moving. Add a stop in program when you want to stop the robot
cue.SetWheelSpeedsNaive: Set robot's speed - keeps moving. Add a stop in program when you want to stop the robot. Less accurate than Set Wheel Speeds
cue.moveForward: Drive forward the specified distance(cm) at specified speed(cm/s) and then stop.
